attributes.action: recognise that the Royal National Lifeboat Institution (RNLI) is an essential emergency service and should be funded as such
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a year that has seen tumultuous storms both at sea and inland, the RNLI has continued to provide an emergency service that is just as necessary as the fire, ambulance, coastguard and police. The RNLI should be afforded the same financial support and recognition that is given to the other emergency services
